item.title: 这家初创公司正利用人工智能辅助机器人制造人类胚胎
item.description:
可想而知的自动化实验室已成功孕育19名婴儿。它在体外受精技术上是否优于人类？【原文：

Conceivable’s automated lab has helped bring 19 babies to life. Is it better at IVF than humans are?

】

item.title: Meta签署多吉瓦级核电协议 为人工智能数据中心供电
item.description: Meta Platforms公司已就其数据中心达成一系列电力协议，这将使其成为超大规模企业同行中最大的核电采购方。【原文：Meta Platforms Inc. agreed to a series of electricity deals for its data centers that will make it the biggest buyer of nuclear power among its hyperscaler peers.】

item.title: 股市多头寄望最高法院推翻特朗普关税政策
item.description:
若最高法院裁定总统败诉，服装、玩具和家具类股料将上涨。

【原文：

Clothing, toy, furniture shares seen gaining if justices rule against president.

】

item.title: 新兴发行人面临利差收窄的卖方市场
item.description: 新兴市场借款人正利用年初卖方市场的优势，其债券与美国国债的利差持续收窄，投资者纷纷将资金涌入发展中国家的债券市场。【原文：Emerging-market borrowers are taking advantage of a start of the year sellers’ market, with spreads narrowing over US Treasuries and investors piling cash into developing nations’ bonds.】

item.title: 零售消费者的购买力预示美国股市将进一步上涨
item.description: 对于质疑美国股市在强劲上涨后还能攀升多少的怀疑者，市场中一股主导力量依然坚定看涨：散户投资者。【原文：For skeptics questioning how much further US stocks can climb after a blockbuster run, one of the market’s dominant forces remains decisively bullish: individual investors.】

item.title: 力拓称若收购嘉能可或考虑持有煤炭资产
item.description: 知情人士透露，力拓集团表示，若与嘉能可的合并谈判成功，将考虑保留嘉能可庞大的煤炭业务。【原文：Rio Tinto Group is open to retaining Glencore Plc’s massive coal business if merger talks between the two companies are successful, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 信实工业股价暴跌6%，财报发布前遭遇新年重挫
item.description: 信实工业有限公司今年开局遭遇重挫，股价下跌逾6%，投资者正消化疲软的零售前景以及美国对印度购买俄罗斯石油的强硬言论——这使得即将公布的财报肩负起遏制股价下跌的重任。【原文：Reliance Industries Ltd. is off to bruising start to the year, with shares down more than 6% as investors digest weak retail outlooks and tougher US rhetoric on India’s Russian oil purchases — putting the onus on upcoming earnings to arrest the slide.】

item.title: 据称，国防公司Vincorion计划于第一季度启动首次公开募股（IPO）。
item.description: 知情人士透露，星资本正考虑最早在今年第一季度于法兰克福为德国国防技术公司Vincorion进行首次公开募股。【原文：Star Capital is considering holding German defense technology firm Vincorion’s initial public offering in Frankfurt as soon as the first quarter of this year, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 印度基础设施贷款机构加大与全球银行的衍生品交易力度
item.description: 据知情人士透露，随着利率下降挤压其利润空间，印度主要的基础设施贷款机构正加大衍生品的使用力度。【原文：India’s main infrastructure lender is boosting the use of derivatives as falling interest rates are squeezing its margins, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 马斯克的Grok将图像生成功能限制为X平台付费用户
item.description: 埃隆·马斯克旗下的XAI公司已将Grok图像生成工具的访问权限限制在X社交平台的付费订阅用户范围内。此前该工具因生成女性和儿童的裸体图像而遭到谴责。【原文：Elon Musk’s XAI has limited Grok’s image-generation tool to paid subscribers on the X social media platform, after the tool drew condemnation for generating undressed images of women and children.】

item.title: 格雷格·格兰丁论门罗主义如何演变为唐诺主义
item.description:
马杜罗被捕的历史背景。

【原文：

The historical context for Maduro's arrest.

】

item.title: 零散话题：从门罗到唐罗主义（播客）
item.description: 零散话题：从门罗到唐罗主义（播客）【原文：Odd Lots: From Monroe To the Donroe Doctrine (Podcast)】

item.title: 雅苒将维持"严格"支出政策，因担忧美国项目成本
item.description: 化肥巨头雅苒国际公司试图安抚投资者对资本支出可能激增的担忧，该公司正寻求扩大在美国的生产规模。【原文：Fertilizer giant Yara International ASA sought to assuage investor concerns that capital spending could balloon as it seeks to expand ammonia production in the US.】

item.title: 英国国债有望创下数月来最佳单周表现，因市场押注英国央行将放松政策推动债券价格上涨
item.description: 英国国债年初强势反弹，因英国政府正逐步减少长期借款，而疲软的通胀数据则助推了市场对英国央行降息的预期。【原文：Gilts are rallying to start the year as the UK government shifts away from long-term borrowing and weaker inflation fuels bets on Bank of England interest rate cuts.】

item.title: 据称沃达丰Idea正考虑通过举债来推动增长
item.description: 知情人士透露，在印度政府决定对历史频谱使用费的年度支付额设限后，沃达丰爱立信有限公司正考虑通过债务融资加速业务增长。【原文：Vodafone Idea Ltd. is considering raising debt financing to accelerate growth, people familiar with the matter said, following the Indian government’s decision to cap annual payouts for past spectrum fees.】

item.title: 委内瑞拉海上滞留石油因美国干预而激增
item.description: 在美方扣押委内瑞拉领导人尼古拉斯·马杜罗并控制该国能源资源后，海上漂浮的委内瑞拉原油量已飙升至三年多来的最高水平。【原文：The volume of Venezuelan crude floating at sea has spiked to the highest level in more than three years after the US seized the country’s leader, Nicolas Maduro, and asserted control over its energy resources.】

item.title: 印度前顾问称关税上调将危及印度经济
item.description: 印度前首席经济顾问阿文德·苏布拉马尼安在接受采访时表示，印度经济尚未显现强劲复苏迹象，而美国提高关税的风险以及中国低价商品倾销加剧可能削弱经济前景。【原文：India’s economy is not showing signs of a robust recovery and the risk of higher US tariffs as well as increased dumping of low-cost Chinese goods could weaken the outlook, former Chief Economic Adviser Arvind Subramanian said in an interview.】

item.title: IAG更换财务总监，吉百利将于六月离职
item.description: 英国航空母公司IAG SA宣布，首席财务官尼古拉斯·卡德伯里将于年中离职。【原文：IAG SA, the parent of British Airways, said Chief Financial Officer Nicholas Cadbury will step down and leave the group in the middle of the year.】

item.title: 万科启动债务重组计划，迈向违约
item.description: 知情人士称，应监管部门要求，中国万科正筹备债务重组方案，这使得这家国内最大房地产开发商之一更接近违约。【原文：China Vanke Co. is preparing a debt restructuring plan at the request of authorities, people familiar with the matter said, pushing one of the country’s largest real estate developers closer to default.】

item.title: RRJ资本为首只私募信贷基金筹集11亿美元
item.description: 据知情人士透露，由前高盛集团银行家创立的私募股权公司RRJ Capital，通过其首支专注亚太地区投资的私募信贷基金首轮融资，已筹集11亿美元资金。【原文：RRJ Capital, a private equity firm founded by a former Goldman Sachs Group Inc. banker, raised $1.1 billion via the first round of financing for its debut private credit fund focusing on investments in Asia Pacific, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 铜价持续攀升，金属类商品有望实现连续第四周上涨
item.description: 基本金属价格持续攀升，铜和铝等品种领涨，延续了该板块强劲的上涨势头。市场对供应趋紧的担忧以及投资者对大宗商品热情高涨，共同推动了此轮涨势。【原文：Base metals including copper and aluminum pushed higher, extending a powerful rally for the sector on concerns about tightening supplies, as well as rising investor enthusiasm for commodities.】

item.title: 英国零售业举步维艰，森宝利圣诞促销表现令人失望
item.description: J·塞恩斯伯里公司报告称，假日季销售额低于预期，成为遭遇圣诞销售困境的英国零售商之一。【原文：J Sainsbury Plc reported weaker-than-expected sales over the holiday season, joining the list of British retailers that faced a tough Christmas.】

item.title: 德国工业产出意外上升，汽车产量增加
item.description: 德国工业产出意外连续第三个月增长，这最新迹象表明欧洲最大经济体的复苏可能正在稳步推进。【原文：German industrial production unexpectedly increased for a third month, the latest signal that a recovery might be taking hold in Europe’s biggest economy.】

item.title: 土耳其副总统誓言维持紧缩经济政策
item.description: 土耳其副总统切夫德特·伊尔马兹表示，尽管通胀出现放缓迹象，土耳其仍将坚持紧缩的经济政策立场，驳斥了通胀回落将促使政策放松的预期。【原文：Turkey will stick with a tight economic policy stance despite signs of easing inflation, Vice President Cevdet Yilmaz said, pushing back against expectations that disinflation will prompt a loosening of policy.】

item.title: 卢特尼克称莫迪未致电特朗普致贸易协议告吹
item.description: 美国商务部长霍华德·卢特尼克表示，去年与印度的贸易协议未能达成，是因为总理纳伦德拉·莫迪没有致电唐纳德·特朗普总统。【原文：US Commerce Secretary Howard Lutnick said a trade deal with India did not materialize last year because Prime Minister Narendra Modi did not call President Donald Trump.】

item.title: 富时100指数有望在矿业巨额交易谈判中上涨
中国机器人制造商亿邦科技据称正考虑在香港上市
item.description: 知情人士透露，中国工业机器人制造商深圳英维思科技有限公司正考虑在香港进行二次上市，加入这波被香港火热市场吸引的企业浪潮。【原文：Chinese industrial robot maker Shenzhen Inovance Technology Co. is considering a second listing in Hong Kong, according to people familiar with the matter, joining a wave of firms drawn to the city’s sizzling market.】

item.title: 日本央行或上调经济增长预期以刺激经济
item.description: 知情人士透露，日本央行本月晚些时候召开政策会议时，很可能上调经济增长预期，但官员们预计将维持基准利率不变。【原文：The Bank of Japan is likely to raise its economic growth projection when its board meets later this month, while officials are set to keep the benchmark interest rate on hold, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 法国油田服务公司Viridien考虑出售传感器业务部门以削减债务
item.description: 法国油田勘探公司Viridien SA可能出售其陆上和海上地震勘探设备业务，此举将使其能够专注于油藏数据处理，并可能加速债务削减进程。【原文：French oil-field surveyor Viridien SA could potentially sell its land and marine seismic equipment business, allowing it to focus on reservoir data-processing and possibly cut debt faster.】

item.title: 沙特对亚洲石油销售在第三次降价后仍将保持强劲
item.description: 沙特阿拉伯对东亚的原油销售量预计将持续高于正常水平，此前全球最大原油出口国因市场出现供应过剩迹象而连续第三个月下调油价。【原文：Crude oil sales from Saudi Arabia to East Asia are set to persist above usual levels after the world’s biggest exporter cut prices for a third month on signs of oversupply in the market.】
